#summary How to get an activity sample

= On OS 10.8 and earlier =
  * Open /Applications/Utilities/Activity Monitor
  * Select iTerm
  * Press "Sample process"
  * Save the file and attach it to a [http://code.google.com/p/iterm2/issues/entry new issue] or existing issue.

= On OS 10.9 =
  * Open /Applications/Utilities/Activity Monitor
  * Click the CPU tab
  * Select iTerm
  * Click the (i) button near the top left
  * Press "Sample"
  * Save the file and attach it to a [http://code.google.com/p/iterm2/issues/entry new issue] or existing issue.
